ygData.subject: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortress

Through the blast, Tucson had managed to stay on his wheels.  Yet, he spins=
 somewhat due to the impact but is quickly righted by Rat Trap who is now i=
nside him, as he floors the pedal to the metal, getting Tucson into the shu=
ttle, via a ramp that Quickstride releases for a short moment of time.  He =
comes to a screeching halt inside, as he jumps out quickly.

" Just in time=
 Lord Elder, I thought we were done for!"  

Quickstride rushes right over =
to Tucson and assesses his condition.  He frantically tries to find an emer=
gency energy line that will fit into his gas port.

"Holy slag..  Just an h=
our more and he would've been ready for the Autobot graveyard.  Hang in the=
re big guy, you're safe now."

Rat Trap notices a fuel door poping open.  
=

"There, that's his fuel port.  Did ya bring any energon?"

Quickstride nod=
ds, as he lets down a canister of energon.

"Hmm, just about ten gallon's w=
orth of fuel, which should last 'em till we get back to the Ark. The backup=
 battery is gonna need at least forty eight hours to recharge...  I think."=


Quickstride hooks Tucson to the emergency Energon tank, and slowly introd=
uces it to his system.  Tucson remains in SUV form to conserve the remainde=
r of what he had left in his emergency tank.

Rat Trap sits beside Tucson a=
nd doesn't move.

" If ya don't mind, I'd like ta stay with Wheels.  I wann=
a make sure he comes outa this okay."

Quickstride nodds, and leaves Rat Tr=
ap with Tucson while returning to Lord Elder.

" It's kinda nice ta see Rat=
 Trap bonding with someone, especially an Autobot.  He's got a hard time ma=
kn' friends, so any friend he makes, is a good thing. The big guy will be o=
kay, but I think it'll take 'em a while before he's a hundred percent."

Ra=
t Trap turns to Quickstride and Lord Elder.

" And I'll be right there when=
 he recovers.  After all, once he gets to the Ark, he'll feel a whole lot b=
etter."

The word "Ark somewhat brings Tucson around.  Yet he remains in SU=
V form.

"Ark..  Optimus Prime..."

Rat Trap puts his hand on Tucson's hood=
.

"That's right Wheels, that's right.  Lord Elder has been guardn' the Ark=
 for ya so that if by chance, an Autobot was still functioning, it would be=
 kept safe for them until they could get back in action. "

Tucson backs up=
 and tries to face Lord Elder.

" I owe Lord Elder my utmost gratitude.  If=
 - you had not guarded the - Ark, all would - have been lost.  I - thank yo=
u deeply for your
loyalty, and - constant vigil over the Autobot vessel.  O=
nce I - figure out how to revive my comrades, I - will be sure they know of=
 your valliant efforts to - protect what is most precious to us. R - Rat Ta=
p.  You too, have - shown bravery in your actions.  I owe you as much, if n=
ot more of my loyalty to you.  without - your help, I would not have gotten=
 out of that fortress."

Rat Trap tries to hold back what appears to be tea=
rs.

"Aw gee Wheels, ain't nothn'.  What're friends for?"

Quickstride secu=
res Tucson so he does not damage his frame any further.

"Easy big guy, you=
've gotten enough dents for one day."

Tucson sighs.

" Sorry, I - didn't k=
now there was a third comrade aboard.  Thank you for  your help.  I will be=
 sure to remember to reward you when all is said - and done."

Rat Trap tra=
nsforms into his rat form, and sits up onto Tucson's hood.

"Hope this does=
n't hurt Wheels, but I can talk to ya a lot better on your hood."

Tucson r=
emains perfectly still.

"Not - at all.  Lord Elder, I - have one favor to =
ask you.  I'd - like to pay my respects to Optimus - Prime once we arrive a=
t the Ark. Do - I have permission to enter the Ark to do so?"

--- In nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> > " I int=
end to finish what I started, I will finish my mission,
> > but after that,=
 do not expect me to have the same amount
> > of respect for you when this =
is all over Rodimus. But now,
> > is not the time for that. I see that what=
 I accomplished was
> > just the first phase. I've accomplished that thus f=
ar. I've
> > learned for myself what needs to be done, and what needs
> > t=
o be done can't be completed today. That will have to wait."
> >
> >
> > " =
I believe this is where you step asside Rodimus, and let us pass."
> 
> Rod=
imus stood before Tuscon, weapon drawn and ready as the Autobot
> went thro=
ugh his soliloquy, the look on his face hard and resolute.
> The Rodimus th=
at stands there, is not exactly the Rodimus Tuscon had
> once known, the Pr=
edacon programing had twisted him, inverted his
> thoughts, changed him in =
ways that even he found surprising in some
> ways.
> 
> However even now as=
 this lone Autobot spoke about dedication and
> courage, there was a part o=
f him that was opened for a moment, as if
> for the briefest of seconds a p=
art of the old Rodimus briefly made an
> appearance . . .
> 
> "NO Autobot,=
 this is where you face termination!" Cyclonus spoke as he
> and Scourge ca=
ught up, breaking into Rodimus' revelry  "It is time to
> finish this!"
> 
=
> "Yes" Said Skorponok as he stepped out of the room, weapons already
> ori=
enting on the Autobot. "He thinks he's Optimus Prime" Scorponok
> said, his=
 voice sarcastic and mocking, "But he is only a pale copy."
> He chuckled, =
"But I do so look forward to his dissection."
> 
> Scourge just chuckled da=
rkly as he approached, his rifle pointed at
> Tuscon and Rat Trap!
> 
> (Me=
anwhile in the Autobot shuttle)
> 
> > Quickstride gets the shuttle airbour=
ne and sets the course
> > for the tower. He tries to lock in on an Autobot=
 signature,
> > and gets Rat Trap's readilly.
> 
> Lord elder nodded as he =
brought the shuttle as close as he dared to
> the Black Fortress! He knew h=
ow powerful this demesne of the Predacons
> could be. Designed to hold off =
an assault, Lord Elder knew his plan
> was risky. He could only hope that R=
at Trap had been able to do
> something on his side.
> 
> > "Sir, I've lock=
ed in on Rat Trap's signature.... And yes, I do
> > see a faint but very fa=
int Autobot signature... It's a bit weaker
> > than normal... Which Oh wow,=
 sir, that Autobot seems to be
> > using a backup battery... Not good... Be=
cause when he loses
> > that he's done for."
> 
> "Confirmed." he said as h=
e also saw the same things on his scanner.
> "The sensors also show several=
 Decepticon and Predacon signatures
> around them, if we don't do something=
 Tuscon and Rat trap would be
> destroyed anyway." With deft fingers he bro=
ught the weapons energy
> cannons online and quickly brought them to bear o=
n the fortress.
> 
> "Hold onto your seat, this is going to get rough!" Eld=
er said as he
> transferred power from the engines to the gunnery platform,=
 in other
> words throwing everything the shuttle had at the Fortress!
> 
>=
 The shuttle shook for a moment as its fore cannons glowed and then
> spewe=
d out a massive burst of energy that bathed the fortress in pure
> destruct=
ive power!
> 
> Back inside the Fortress the very base shook as it absorbed=
 the
> massive onslaught from the Autobot shuttle! The lights flickered as
=
> energy fields went down.
> 
> Cyclonus, Scourge and Rodimus were knocked =
off their feet and
> Scorponok was sent sailing back into the torture chamb=
er as the world
> inside the Fortress went completely dark for a moment and=
 then winked
> back on dimly as emergency lights came online.
> 
> An alert=
 sounded, it would be only be less than 30 seconds before the
> Fortress' c=
omputer reset the system and brought itself and all the
> bases' systems ba=
ck on line!
> 
> Meanwhile outside Lord Elder struggle frantically to redir=
ect the
> shuttle's energy from the weapons and back to the engines, as the=

> shuttle at the moment was falling from the skies, looking less like
> th=
e elegant flying machine it was and more like a brick!

n the affected to the Fortress with Airly's permission)
